1573670.name: The Fabled Woods - Notebook
1573670.description:
You find the PDF notebook here on your harddrive: [...]\Steam\steamapps\common\The Fabled Woods\The Fabled Woods - Notebook

Please take a moment before you read on!

If you have not made your way through The Fabled Woods so far, I would not recommend you to read any further.

This notebook might hold the answers to your questions, but it would also spoile facts and mysteries, that are meant to be uncovered in the deep forrest.

So take the path less traveled and everything will be explained soon.

I promise.
